#summary The Location class

= The Location class=

The Location class mirrors dcterms:Location which is imported into the Darwin Core vocabulary.  It is imported directly into darwin-sw (DSW).

==DwC terms suitable for use as properties in DSW (not a complete list)==
===Data properties===
 * *decimalLatitude*  can use *geo:lat* instead if geodetic reference datum is  WGS84
 * *decimalLongitude*  Can use *geo:long* instead if if geodetic reference datum is  WGS84
 * *minimumElevationInMeters* and *maximumElevationInMeters*  Can both be replaced by a single value for *geo:alt*
 * *geodeticDatum*  Note: not necessary with geo: terms
 * *coordinateUncertaintyInMeters*  Suitable term for indicating uncertainty in latitude and longitude
 * *locationRemarks* text literal
 * *georeferenceRemarks* text literal
 * *georeferencedBy* text literal form, us georeferencedByURI for object property
 * *countryCode* ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country codes (text literal)
 * *stateProvince* unabbreviated text literal
 * *county* unabbreviated text literal
 * *locality* text literal


===Object properties===
 * *georeferencedByURI* range FOAF entities (e.g. a *foaf:Person*)
 * *locates* range Event
